resources.title: A Cancer Survivor's Journey: Learning to Heal Others. Bridging Modern Medicine & Ancient Wisdom
resources.description: After her cancer diagnosis, Sangeeta found energy healing accelerated her recovery. This led her and her husband, Rajiv, to study and become healers themselves. Their message: the best healing comes from marrying modern medicine with ancient wisdom. It's not mystical but a protocol-driven practice you can learn and understand.

resources.title: Cancer, Loss, and New Beginnings | When Friends Become Your Foundation
resources.description: Between cities, between worlds—Sangeeta faced her cancer diagnosis with no home in Delhi and feeling alienated in New York. With her parents gone and a young daughter to care for, friends stepped up: Dr. Khurana coordinated care, the Lambas opened their home, family flew in to help. This is the truth about beating cancer: you can't do it alone.

resources.title: Navigating Cancer as a Couple. Finding Patience, Acceptance, and Grace Together
resources.description: When cancer enters your lives, the hardest lesson is patience. You both want wellness to return quickly, but healing takes time. Sangeeta and Rajiv learned to cultivate patience, acceptance, and introspection. As spiritual teacher Ram Das taught after his own stroke: this is grace. Look inward, understand the universe's message, and accept the journey with patience and grace.

resources.title: Learning Energy Healing: From Basic Techniques to Psychotherapy
resources.description: Energy healing isn't mystical—it's protocol-driven with clear training levels. Basic healing teaches fundamentals. Advanced level introduces color therapy and nuanced techniques. Psychotherapy level addresses psychological issues with specialized protocols. And then there is practice.

resources.title: Remote Energy Healing: The Support I Found After Cancer Treatment
resources.description: After cancer treatment ended, Sangeeta struggled to even walk to her balcony. A remote energy healer entered her life—someone who truly understood what she was going through. Though they never met face-to-face, the healing was real. This experience opened Sangeeta's eyes to a world of healing modalities that exist beyond conventional medicine, yet remain largely unknown to most people.

resources.title: Neerad's Journey Through Cancer : Brave, Honest Resilient.
resources.description: Neerad emerged from his bout with Leukemia, braver, better and stronger. He set up BMT Foundation to help patients like him. His story of taking care of the guest, cancer and then letting it go.

resources.title: Essential Oil Remedy: Anugnya Holistic Care's Answer to Radiation and Chemo
resources.description: Chief Healing Officer Sangeeta Bhalla explains how her proprietary blends maintain patients' physical, energy and emotional strength to ensure continuity of cancer treatment.

resources.title: Viiveck Verma : A Caregiver's Journey. (The caregiver needs care too.)
resources.description: Viiveck took care of Prernaa, his wife. She had a 11 year journey with 9 reappearances of Cancer. For both it is a profile in courage. He shares, in hindsight, what he would have done differently.

resources.title: Sangeeta's Cancer Recovery Journey: From Patient to Healer to Entrepreneur
resources.description: We explore Sangeeta's 10 year journey following her cancer diagnosis, her transition from patient to healer, establishment of Anugnya Holistic Care to help cancer patients in their journey to wellness
